lenders.name: Pablo
lenders.loan_because: para mejorar y difundir el arte de los títeres con cuentos de la tradición oral y en especial con historias bíblicas (evangelio)cristianas.
lenders.occupational_info: TÍTERES “PABLO PAPAS” SE ESPECIALIZA EN EL TEATRO GUIÑOL, ESTE TEATRO DE TÍTERES CREA UNA ATMÓSFERA FANTÁSTICA, SU HUMOR INTRÉPIDO O SU AGRESIVIDAD GROTESCA, ACTÚA BAJO UNA ATMÓSFERA DE MAGIA Y MISTERIO, EN ESTAS PEQUEÑAS FIGURAS RESIDE UNA FUERZA MISTERIOSA CAPAS DE HECHIZAR A NIÑOS Y ADULTOS, HASTA LLEVARLOS A SENTIR VIDA DONDE SOLO HAY CARTÓN, HULE ESPUMA, MADERA Y TRAPOS COLORIDOS, ILUSIONADO, EL ESPECTADOR VE SOLAMENTE AQUELLO QUE QUIERE VER, Y AÚN FASCINADO POR LA FARSA UNE SU PROPIA IMAGINACIÓN CREADORA A LA TRAMA Y VE MUCHO MÁS. VE A LOS TÍTERES REÍR Y LLORAR Y ENCUENTRA DISTINTAS EXPRESIONES REFLEJADAS EN LA CARA DEL TÍTERE, QUE SIN EMBARGO ES RÍGIDA  COMO UNA MÁSCARA DE TRAGEDIA GRIEGA. CON CUENTOS DE LA TRADICIÓN ORAL INDÍGENA, RESCATA PERSONAJES POPULARES DE LA CULTURA MEXICANA Y RECREA CON ELLOS OBRAS, ENCAMINADAS NO SÓLO A DIVERTIR Y ENTRETENER, TAMBIÉN MANEJA VALORES POSITIVOS Y CONCRETOS QUE REVIERTAN DE ALGÚN MODO EN LOS PEQUEÑOS ESPECTADORES YA SEA DE INMEDIATO O POSTERIORMENTE.

lenders.name: Jarna of blissfulminds
lenders.loan_because: Paying Forward! It just works! Helping others is the way to elevate yourself and others! KIVA ROCKS!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a yoga teacher for children  and entrepreneur! My job is to inspire the little ones to do great things with their lives. To live in a natural state of happiness and help our global community! I am taking 10% of all my sales and donating them to someone in need via KIVA!

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because: I don't like giving handouts.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist children with special needs to get the most out of thier lives.

lenders.name: Nate
lenders.loan_because: I am able to.

lenders.name: João
lenders.loan_because: I find peace in helping others
lenders.occupational_info: "If one would help the other, all the world would be helping each other"

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Textile artist focused on print design. I love fabric!

lenders.name: OGHS
lenders.loan_because: I help my students see that they can be the difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Saving lives and easing suffering through education.

lenders.name: Bre and Ian
lenders.loan_because: "Lend to him who asks."
lenders.occupational_info: By day, Ian analyzes international tax transaction for a law firm in Washington, DC, and by night, attends law school. Bre is a nurse and a volunteer.  Our real job is being new parents.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: It began with a gift certificate!!!  Now I'm hooked---the stories are very inspiring about people working hard to help themselves get ahead
lenders.occupational_info: I have raised three children and now live a retired life with my retired husband.  I keep house and do much work with my church.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a good way to lend a hand directly to hard working entrepreneurs around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a government employee working in  telecommunications and IT support.

lenders.name: nodeposit
lenders.occupational_info: Ya' baby! this is your place to win!

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: This program is the best idea I have ever heard--quite literally!  It bypasses the World Bank and corrupt governments and loans directly to an individual with a specific business need.

lenders.name: Bryce
lenders.loan_because: It's all I can do until I graduate.
lenders.occupational_info: Majoring in developmental economics and international affairs.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: This is an amazing way to help others globally.  It's so easy and it makes such a big difference!

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people's dreams come true.

lenders.name: Micki
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the world become a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I graduated high school and am now on a year off.

lenders.name: Allie
lenders.loan_because: I am very interesting in helping others.  I know that I am very blessed, so I feel that it is my responsibility to help those who aren't as lucky as me.  I want to make the world a better place!
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a senior in high school, and I am homeschooled.

lenders.name: S. Jeuland
lenders.loan_because: providing people the resources they need to work themselves out of poverty empowers them and shows them that the world cares.
lenders.occupational_info: Developmental economics and international nutrition

lenders.name: Breana
lenders.loan_because: i just want to make a difference

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I'm in a position to be able to help those that don't have access to the resources I take for granted.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: I'm a small business owner myself and know how important funding is to helping a business grow.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I'll waste the money if I don't.

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: If it takes a village to raise a child, it takes everyone to raise a society.
lenders.occupational_info: I help doctors and hospitals get paid for their services.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I heard of Kiva through a friend and am delighted to be a member.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a public servant for 31 years now since I migrated to Canada from South America.  Having been born there I truly can relate to the obstacles and hardships endured by these enterprising individuals.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I care about the lives and dreams of others.
lenders.occupational_info: A chance to interact with people.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: a small amount of money for me can improve someone else's life in a sustainable way
lenders.occupational_info: linguist interested in endangered languages

lenders.name: Gerardo
lenders.loan_because: Every hard working  individual deserves an opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: My job? Awesome - I work with numbers all day.

lenders.name: Sumit
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have great opportunity in my life, and wish for others to have the same

lenders.name: The B Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe in encouraging people to follow their passions and giving them an opportunity to work to support their families and communities.  Our business experience has taught us that it often takes money to make money.  People have believed in us enough to invest in our ventures and it is a blessing for us to be able to invest in the lives of others.

lenders.name: Phillip
lenders.occupational_info: I help healthcare companies raise money.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I've heard about micro-financing from a few different presentations this year (my freshman year of college) and it sounds like the most direct way i can help someone abroad while I'm stuck here studying.
lenders.occupational_info: The work of an engineer is to find creative solutions to problems that benefit the world.

lenders.name: Juanjo
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students about people who lived hundreds of years ago. I tell them about their desires, fears, expectations and views of the world they experienced.

lenders.name: Tullett Prebon
lenders.loan_because: I Love People
lenders.occupational_info: Charitable capitalists

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful that I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I purchase women's shoes for a department store based in New York City.

lenders.name: julie sands
lenders.loan_because: We need to take care of all our people around the world

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: it is better than donating to a charity and it works better than the World Bank and the IMF.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently studying for my Masters degree in International Relations in Bremen, Germany.  Global poverty is an issue we deal with a lot, and so far I am very convinced by the promises of microfinance.

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: I hope to leave this world better than I found it.

lenders.name: Jennifer Jiong Gong
lenders.loan_because: empowerment is beautiful

lenders.name: Justinian & Christina
lenders.loan_because: it's easy, we can share our successes and help someone reach their goals!

lenders.name: Magnus
lenders.loan_because: Hopefuly I can make a difference.

lenders.name: Marshall
lenders.loan_because: I know what it feels like to need money and not have it. Now that I'm in a situation where I can help others I feel it's my duty to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage financial investment applications for a larger financial services company.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: our small, individual actions add up to something amazing.

lenders.name: Tamara & Austin
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by those who continue to choose hope and light no matter what their circumstances.  I loan to show my son how we make a difference in the lives of others and to keep us connected to the compassion of the world.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Third world needs investment in order to grow.  What better investors than people on the ground who know the pitfalls and the opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: Teach economics, strategy, marketing, and finance to community college students age 18 to 65.

lenders.name: will
lenders.loan_because: i want to give something back

lenders.name: Alyssa
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva gives us a great opportunity to help those that are struggling get up on their feet and moving in the right direction.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at the moment, studying Creative Writing at the University of Arizona. I'm not sure what I want to do after I graduate. Money is tight, but I have some to spare and love that I can help people with it.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: A little help can go a long way.

lenders.name: Felipe
lenders.loan_because: sharing means caring
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a tiny office writing things nobody even reads

lenders.name: Pavani
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people empower themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I make technology such as computer software or websites easier and more fun to use.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: I love to help others and this is so easy to do!
lenders.occupational_info: I flunked retirement and went back to work so that I can help others and satisfy myself.

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because: There isn't a better feeling in the world than giving and knowing that the need is genuine. Just because we live on opposite sides of the world does not mean that we love, hurt, or need differently.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for a local newspaper. I talk to the people who live in the community each day and get to share the stories of their lives.

lenders.name: Lauren C.
lenders.loan_because: Tiffany and Tom asked me to...and to restore Karma
lenders.occupational_info: I train college students to tutor elementary students and I make pictures of fruit out of construction paper

lenders.name: Rich
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Aurel
lenders.loan_because: I got a gift certificate for my godchild.

lenders.name: Rod
lenders.loan_because: I am able and it works.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the least (matt 25:40)

lenders.name: Hunter
lenders.loan_because: I think that it will help.
lenders.occupational_info: Designing systems to treat water and wastewater.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I am privileged and luckier than I deserve. If I can give a little back it may help me appreciate what I have and the struggles others endure.
lenders.occupational_info: I try hard in school though I bet I could do better with more consistent effort.

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: it will make a difference!

lenders.name: Janie
lenders.loan_because: What you contribute to the world you get back two-fold.
lenders.occupational_info: I solve technology problems and give recommendations.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: I can, and others need my help.
lenders.occupational_info: In my work people with sadness or trouble talk with me and try to figure out how they feel, what in their life is not right, what they want to do, and how they will do it.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: It makes good sense.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people stay healthy

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: This is an easy way to help out someone who needs a temporary boost.  I am inspired by how hard working and deserving all the recipients are.  It's so difficult to choose to whom I will lend!  KIVA gift certificates have become my gift of choice to family and friends on special occasions.

lenders.name: Unlea
lenders.loan_because: If everyone that can afford to, chips in and loans even a small amount like $25 we can make the world a far better place...

lenders.name: Tristan
lenders.occupational_info: I make art for video games.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: the beautiful heart of Nina Patel (http://www.kiva.org/invitedby/nina9882) inspires me.

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We became debt free in 2008 and realize the gift that we have in that freedom.
lenders.occupational_info: Technical - needed - part of something greater than myself.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: My job would be hard to explain if you don't do it. It is enough to say that I work for a good company that cares about its employees, and that everybody should have that chance.
